tasks.label: Build release
tasks.command: g++ -g -std=c++20 -Icommon -Itokenizer -Iparser -Icode_gen main.cpp code_gen/*.cpp common/*.cpp parser/*.cpp tokenizer/*.cpp -o fasm.exe

tasks.label: Build debug
tasks.command: g++ -g -std=c++20 -Icommon -Itokenizer -Iparser -Icode_gen -DPRINT_TOKENS -DPRINT_LABELS main.cpp code_gen/*.cpp common/*.cpp parser/*.cpp tokenizer/*.cpp -o fasm_debug.exe
